Pre-Game Insights: India has maintained an unbeaten record in the ICC Men's ODI World Cup 2023.
South Africa's only loss came against the Netherlands, with a 38-run deficit.
India currently holds the top position on the points table, having played seven and won as many matches, becoming the 1st team to qualify.
South Africa is not far behind and has also played seven matches having won six and a very healthy Net Run Rate (NRR).
The Proteas, despite being in second place on the points table, boasts a superior NRR compared to India, standing at +2.290.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch for the upcoming match is expected to strike a balance between favoring both batsmen and bowlers.
In the previous five matches on this pitch, the average first innings total has been approximately 225 runs.
Others: Former India skipper Virat Kohli will celebrate his 35th birthday on the day of the match.
The match will take place at the iconic Eden Gardens in Kolkata.
India vs South Africa will be live streamed on Disney+ Hotstar and can be watched on the Star Sports Network.
